mtte.homeWelcome: Welcome! Moulinette gives you access to a community market of various items (scenes, images, playlists) that you can easily install without having to install separate modules.
mtte.communityMarketHelp: Visit the community market and choose what you want.
mtte.moulinetteMineHelp: See pending requests from the market place.
mtte.learnMore: to learn more about Moulinette and/or support it.
mtte.marketWelcome: Instructions : check all resources you want to request Moulinette.
mtte.clickToClose: Click anywhere to close preview window
ERROR.mtteGMOnly: This interface is only for GMs.
